objects.text:
• Digital LED Display With Intuitive Controls
• Energy-Efficient Design
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles
• Quiet Operation Technology

product_details.name: Insignia Modern Front-Load Washer & Dryer Set - Efficiency Meets Style
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with intuitive controls for easy operation
• Spacious front-load washer with large capacity drum
• Energy-efficient design to reduce utility costs
• Multiple wash and dry cycles to suit various fabric types
• Sleek white finish with modern black accents
• Matching washer and dryer set for complete laundry solution
• Advanced moisture sensing technology in dryer
• Customizable temperature and spin settings
• Stackable design option to save space
• Quiet operation technology for peaceful home environment
• Easy-access front loading design
• Large door opening for convenient loading and unloading

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout promoting a laundry appliance. The headline—split between text layers `heading_1` and `heading_2`—delivers a bold message in uppercase using a spacious, geometric font. Below it, the `tagline` layer complements with a thinner tech-inspired style, enhancing the banner's sleek, contemporary vibe. The `description` layer lists four essential product features in bullet-point format, maintaining readability and clarity. The `price` layer draws attention with bold, large numerals. A rectangular `cta_button` backing the “SHOP NOW” call-to-action (`cta`) completes the conversion area. The centerpiece is a laundry product (`product_image`), and the `background` includes rounded frames and subtle vector waves for a soft dynamic effect.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#2E5984)
- Soft Blue (#98C1D9)
- Charcoal Blue (#2D4762)
- Pale Blue (#F5F9FC)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern design with a predominantly white color palette that exudes cleanliness and sophistication. The main body of the appliances is bright white (#FFFFFF), creating a crisp, minimalistic base. Contrasting details like the doors and control panels use deep charcoal black (#1C1C1C) and glossy black (#2E2E2E), which add depth and elegance. Control knobs incorporate metallic silver (#C0C0C0) with a light blue accent (#00AEEF) for a tech-savvy feel, while LED displays glow in vibrant cyan blue (#00FFFF). These colors blend seamlessly while maintaining emphasis through sharp contrasts and matte-gloss finishes, ideal for a clean, tech-forward banner.
